start training finish training finish item training refresh code device user name device password login device login cloud connecting…… DR. U good at preventing myopia and rehabilitating asthenopia step 1 ①download UYUApp step 2 ②register and login UYU account step 3 ③scan UYU QR code start scan and continue （training will be finished in 4 minutes） choose your book or news which article or news would you like to start?
training finished, you could read the results in UYU official account ok download UYUAPP instructions prepare adjustment ability coordinating scattering coordinating gathering use wechat scan QR code self exam use UYU APP scan QR code training back logining…… welcome, Bluetooth preparing…… mobile phone scan and download UYU APP device will be available only after software updated finish current training spherical glasses strength cylinder glasses strength astigmatism axial
receive continuing instruction training program is not activated yet, please wait training program is not ready yet, please wait pausing status, please wait content loop mode obtaining article error, please use character training program obtaining news error, please use character training program please don’t start until device adjusted reset finished receive pushing message instructions obtain user synergic book information error current level please don’t press too often level please wait loading data submitting… submitting and saving data… self-experience finished training status updating… data submitting error start-updating reception information error finish-updating reception information error finished waiting optometrist to next step success error: obtaining token error fail font level obtaining QR code obtain training QR code error, please refresh and try again update training status and submit update training status and submit failed data submit receive reset information connected connect error token verify error token verified execute control instruction and motor adjusted receive motor control instruction, but current training program executing error receive training control instruction-verifying value setting error receive training control instruction
please press to next step adjust device height accordingly wear prescription glasses adjust the chair to make sure you can looking straight ahead at the screen put on the headphones, put the right hand on the confirm button, follow the guide and start the training coordinating scatter program will be started, it will last 3minutes pick up the z shaped separator put the z shaped separator on the schematic position press the cinfirm key and start traning pick up the double-aperture baffle put the double-aperture baffle on the schematic position install successfully pick up the single-aperture baffle put the single-aperture baffle on the schematic position install successfully next training item: adjustment ability, it will last 5 minutes please press button when you could see clearly choose reading material choose font size put guide rod on the holder next training item: coordinating gathering, it will last 1 minute please watch and keep the square, X and circular in line please watch and make two pictures into one straight line dotted line curve take a break please choose training content adjustment break prompt eye training level 1. Training finished, please far-gaze for break 2. take down the single/double-aperture baffle 2、take down the z shaped separator 2、take down the guide rod
The book you selected is： Training end reconnect approach please select the content for traning on your app or use the default content\n if you select article,the traning will start from the one you selected and cycle \n if you select news, the traning will start from the one you selected and then other news after it
loop order random number news left right double aggregate spread positive negative bluetooth lost bluetooth connection success time: minutes seconds millisecond hour day (traning will end after %s pause) Network response timeout, please check the network connection
Bluetooth is not available Not in traning Training is ongoing, can\'t start a new one Status exception Device is occupied Received ending message, but not for current traning Received ending message, but training hasn\'t started Received unlocking message, but not for current traning Received unlocking message, but device is not locked Can\'t exit because the current device is occupied by other trainer Can\'t start training because there is an ongoing traning Content push can\'t be executed Content has been pushed, but training hasn\'t started Training is ending, please wait a moment Training ends successfully All traning have been ended Reset complete Interpupillary distance adjustment complete Failed to get reception infomation Other pad is connecting this device This device is on welcome screen, received unresponsive %s message
